trends: There have been no other sightings in South Shore
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I was outside on Nov 13, 2003. It was my cousins birthday. I looked up and saw a red light just in the sky. It wasnt moving, then it blinked and disappered. It then appeared to the far west of the sky. I was facing Portsmouth Ohio. It was about 930pm. I also saw what apperard to be a shooting star soon afterwards.
